attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# update packages
sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y upgrade

# install some useful packages
sudo yum -y install git bash-completion vim net-tools bind-utils wget

# set the hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname @@{HOSTNAME}@@

attrs.script:
#!/bin/sh

# update packages
sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y upgrade

# install some useful packages
sudo yum -y install git bash-completion vim net-tools bind-utils wget

# set the hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname @@{HOSTNAME}@@
